Daniel Moreno
=============

[City Council](https://mybigspring.com/Directory.aspx?DID=24)
Title: Council Member - District 6
Phone:
432-264-2501
Additional Phone:
432-553-1271
[Email](mailto:dmoreno@mybigspring.com)

Daniel Moreno, born in Fort Hood, Texas, moved to Big Spring, Texas, at the age of four and has proudly called Big Spring home ever since. He attended all public schools in Big Spring and graduated from Big Spring High School. Daniel furthered his education by earning an Associate of Science in General Studies from Howard College and a Bachelor of Business Administration in Management from the University of Texas Permian Basin.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In addition to his academic achievements, Daniel is married to his beautiful wife, Casedy. He is an active member of Family Faith Center since 2014, where Daniel serves as a Youth Leader within the Preteens and Uprising Youth Ministry.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Daniel's commitment to his community extends to his professional life as an ESOL Teacher (English as a Second Language) at his alma mater, Big Spring High School and has been teaching since 2021. In this role, he passionately teaches English and grammar to Emergent Bilingual/English Learners students.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After two unsuccessful attempts for City Council District 5 in 2019 and 2021, Daniel's district was realigned, prompting him to run for the May 2024 General Election City Council District 6 position. His perseverance paid off, as he was sworn in on May 14, 2024, to represent District 6, showcasing the trust and confidence his community places in him to advocate for their interests and concerns.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Daniel's goals for the City of Big Spring include establishing a transparent government, improving infrastructure, ensuring essential city services are adequately funded and staffed, attracting new businesses, and keeping taxes low to support the economic well-being of the community.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
